name: market for peat moss | peat moss | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10571/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'peat moss', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;peat moss' is an organic substance. Its used in medicine, personal care, food industry and as a fuel. If used as a fuel, it has a combustion value of 17.88 MJ/kg and is used as a domestic and seldom industrial power source.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'peat moss',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'peat moss',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
